examples.example: 那则广告创意十足，给人们带来了很多欢乐和启发。

translate.english: That advertisement is full of creativity and has brought a lot of joy and inspiration to people.

examples.example: 这则广告充满了正能量，激励着人们积极向上地生活。

translate.english: This advertisement is full of positive energy and inspires people to live a positive life.

examples.example: 这则广告别出心裁，让人们感受到了生活的美好与多彩。

translate.english: This advertisement is very creative and makes people feel the beauty and variety of life.
